author: Anonymous Helix
title: MT1 rules
question:
This might be kind of a dumb question, but I just wanted to confirm anyway to be safe.
During the midterm, are we expected to be looking at the camera/computer the entire time? Like what if we need to draw something out on paper or iPad, its fine if we look away from the camera/computer running Dr. Racket right?
student_answer: Yes, that should be fine! According to the rules you’re allowed to have a printed out version of the recipe checklist as well so even if you’re looking at that you’d have to look away from the camera! I think the main rule is just that you have to have your camera on at a proper angle at all times.
